infinity_generator.message: With the current bonus of $t(foe_data.gb.Chateau_Frontenac), you will earn more coins and more supplies than you will use to complete the quests. Please choose the number of "$t(components.cf_calculator.block_cfc.infinity_generator.label)" you want to do.
infinity_generator.label: Cumulative quest

description.p1: Enter the values for level and bonus percentage. The values in the table update automatically.
description.p2_html: Note: If the update is not done automatically, first set the GB level and the overall investment value and click on "$t(components.gb_investment.gb_investment.form.submit_global)". If you want to adjust the values of each place, adjust to your convenience and click on "$t(components.gb_investment.gb_investment.form.submit_custom)".

thead.th3: FP to put by the owner to secure the place

description.p1: This view allows to see the gain that can be obtained by taking a place with or without taking into account investments in other places. There are {{count}} types of consideration of other places:

description.no: do not take into account other places
description.normal: take into account the other places with a minimum investment of investors and without securing by the owner
description.optimal: take into the account the other places with an investment without profit of the investors and with securing by owner

gb_forecast_cost.title: Forecast
gb_forecast_cost.p1: Determine the number of FPs to go from one level to another, with or without Ark's bonuses.
gb_forecast_cost.estimated_time: Estimate time to reach the level

message.single: To complete the level {{level}} of "$t({{gb}})", the owner has to invest {{preparation, number}} FPs. Total cost of level: {{cost, number}} FPs.
message.multi: To complete the level {{level}} of "$t({{gb}})", the owner has to invest {{preparation, number}} FPs. Total cost of levels: {{cost, number}} FPs.
message.diff: With bonus investments, you'll save {{count}} FP
message.diff_plural: With bonus investments, you'll save {{count, number}} FPs
message.estimated_time: Estimated time to reach the level: {{time}}

gb_forecast_cost.prop_already_invested: FPs already invested by the owner on the current level

graph.title: Forecast of the owner's preparation amount for "$t({{gb}})"

gb_statistics.title: $t(routes.gb_statistics.hero.title)
gb_statistics.p1: The graphs are made according to the Age because the cost / reward of the GBs is the same for each GB of an age, except in a particular case ($t(foe_data.gb.Oracle_of_Delphi)).

graph.title_1: Evolution of the cost of the levels according to the levels
graph.title_2: Evolution of the reward of the first place according to the levels
graph.title_3: Evolution of the cost of the levels according to the reward of the first place
graph.title_4: Evolution of the reward of the first place according to the cost of the levels

block_place.title: Block his place
block_place.other_participation: Participation of the player to overtake
block_place.fp_to_complete_level: Number of FP remaining to complete the level: {{count}}
block_place.fp_to_complete_level_plural: Number of FPs remaining to complete the level: {{count, number}}

result.error: One or more values are not valid.
result.default: You must have totaled {{count}} FP to block the place.
result.default_plural: You must have totaled {{count, number}} FPs to block the place.
result.fp_to_secure_html: You still have to put {{count}} FP.
result.fp_to_secure_html_plural: You still have to put {{count, number}} FPs.
result.cant_block: You can not block the place.

roi.neutral: You will not have a return on investment

hero.title: $t(common:site_title)
hero.slogan_html: A set of tools to simplify life on $t(common:links.foe)

cookie.message: By continuing to use $t(common:site_title), you agree to the use of cookies to improve your comfort of use.

site_layout.permalink_info: You visit a permalink. Consequently, any changes made will not be saved in cookies.

message.result: For {{to}} {{ageTo}}, you need {{from}} {{ageFrom}} with offers up to {{count}}:

general_info.title: General information
general_info.p1_html:
Forge of Empires, FOE, and all related trademarks and content belong to InnoGames GmbH.
$t(common:site_title) is an unofficial third party site and is not affiliated with InnoGames.
general_info.p2_html: $t(common:site_title) was created by the French player Yoratheon.
general_info.p3_html:
The site is OpenSource, the code is freely available on GitHub.
Thus, everyone with the necessary skills can participate in the improvement of this site.

cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.p1: To improve your comfort of use, the site uses cookies.
cookie.p2_html:
We store the display language.
In "$t(components.gb_investment.gb_investment.title)" tool, we store for each GB the level and various percentages of investors so we do not have to re-enter them each time.
Please note that when you visit a "$t(utils.permalink)" page, no information on the level of GB and the various percentages of investors is stored.
cookie.p3: In "$t(routes.cf_calculator.hero.title)" tool, we store all form input.

dev_info.title: Development information
dev_info.p1: The site is a simple static site hosted on GitHub.
dev_info.p2_html: The development is done in Node.js using $t(common:links.framework). The style is made using $t(common:links.style).
dev_info.p3_html: An idea of functionality? A problem ? Feel free to create an issue on GitHub or send me an email (in English or in French) at $t(common:links.contact_foe_tools).
dev_info.message_info_github_issue: Note: Regarding issues on GitHub, please make sure to write them in English to facilitate understanding for the greatest number.

hero.title: Campaign cost
hero.subtitle: This tool predicts the cost of a sector or province.

hero.title: Château Frontenac Calculator
hero.subtitle: A tool that help forecast goods and fp productions from doing recurring quests and unbirthday party quest (Rinbin).

hero.title: Contributors
hero.subtitle: This page attempt to list all contributors

tbody.td1: "$t(routes.gb_investment_gb_chooser.hero.title)" and "$t(routes.secure_position.hero.title)" are based on huge work of his spreadsheets
tbody.td2: "$t(routes.cf_calculator.hero.title)" are based on splendid work of his spreadsheet

hero.title: GB Investment
hero.subtitle: This tool makes it possible to calculate the number of points that a player must put on his GB to secure the first 5 places following a rate (arc bonus).

hero.title: Forecast cost GB
hero.subtitle: This tool determine the number of FPs to go from one level to another of a GB, with or without Ark's bonuses.

hero.title: GB Statistics
hero.subtitle: This tool allows to visualize graphs on the evolution of the costs of the GB following the Age.

hero.title: Secure place
hero.subtitle: This tool calculates the number of FP that a player must put on a GB to block his place.

hero.title: Trade
hero.subtitle: This tool facilitates your business by offering you the best rates according to your way of trading.

trade_2_1.message: Simple trade, ratio 1 for 1 with resources of the same age and 1 for 2 in order to get resources with one gap age.

fair_trade.title: Fair Trade
fair_trade.message: This type of trade takes into account the cost of manufacturing a good (coins and resources) to determine the rates between the goods.

404.title: Page not found | $t(common:site_title)
404.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or no more

military_boost.name: Military boost
military_boost.gb_description: Raises the attack and defense bonus for units in attacking army, adds up with every building.

fierce_resistance.name: Fierce resistance
fierce_resistance.gb_description: Raises the attack and defense bonus for units in defending army and increases support pool bonus, adds up with every building.

coin_boost.name: Coin boost
coin_boost.gb_description: Raises the outcome of your houses up to 90 times with each collect, adds up with productivity and motivation.

supply_boost.name: Supply boost
supply_boost.gb_description: Raises the outcome of your production buildings, adds up with productivity, motivation, and other supply boosts.

good_production.name: Good Production
good_production.gb_description: Produces a certain amount of goods from your current age every 24 hours. From Modern Era on, produces double the amount in unrefined goods.

medal_production.name: Medal production
medal_production.gb_description: Produces a certain amount of medals every 24 hours.

research.name: Research
research.gb_description: Produces a small amount of forge points every 24 hours.

coin_production.name: Coin production
coin_production.gb_description: Produces a certain amount of coins every 24 hours.

supply_production.name: Supply production
supply_production.gb_description: Produces a certain amount of supplies every 24 hours.

quest_reward_boost.name: Quest reward boost
quest_reward_boost.gb_description: Raises only your coins, supplies, goods, medals, or diamonds from quest rewards.

penal_unit.name: Penal Unit
penal_unit.gb_description: Recruits unattached units every 24 hours, randomly chosen from any military building in your city.

guild_goods.name: Guild Goods
guild_goods.gb_description: Produces current era goods which go straight to the Guild Treasury.

support_pool_bonus.name: Support Pool Bonus
support_pool_bonus.gb_description: Raises your guild's support pool bonus, adds up with every building.

aid_goods.name: Aid Goods
aid_goods.gb_description: Produces 1 random good when aiding another player's city (manually motivating/polishing them also counts as aiding). The age of the random good corresponds to the age of the building you are aiding.

plunder_goods.name: Plunder Goods
plunder_goods.gb_description: Produces random goods for up to 3 neighbors with each collect when plundering another player's city. The age of the random goods corresponds to the age of the building you are plundering.

contribution_boost.name: Contribution Boost
contribution_boost.gb_description: Raises the Forge Points, Medals, and Blueprints you receive from donation rewards.

aid_blueprints.name: Aid Blueprints
aid_blueprints.gb_description: Raises the chance of obtaining a blueprint when aiding another player's city (manually motivating/polishing them also counts as aiding). I.E. Having a 100% bonus will double your chance of finding a blueprint.

relic_hunt.name: Relic Hunt
relic_hunt.gb_description: This ability gives you the possibility to receive Relics on the Guild Expedition map whenever you successfully solve an encounter. Relics are very valuable and can appear in 3 different rarities. Each level increases the chance to find a Relic but also the odds to find an uncommon or rare Relic, as opposed to a common one.

critical_hit.name: Critical Hit
critical_hit.gb_description: Gives all units the chance of dealing 1.5 times the expected damage when attacking units of the same era. Critical hit also works against Reactive Armor (if expected damage is 4-4, a critical hit will do 6-6 damage). Rogues (and other no-age units) are not affected/cannot use this ability until they transform into another unit. A critical hit doing at least 11 damage will one-hit kill any unit, even with the morale bonus. This bonus applies to all attacking armies plus your defending army in PvP. The critical hit will not happen when a unit is retaliating.

helping_hands.name: Helping Hands
helping_hands.gb_description: Gives you a certain chance to get a random resource when aiding another player's city (manually motivating/polishing them also counts as aiding). You can recieve goods from your current age, supplies, coins, medals, or even Diamonds.

plunder_and_pillage.name: Plunder and Pillage
plunder_and_pillage.gb_description: Gives you a certain chance to get double the resources when you plunder a neighbor's city after successfully defeating their defenses. It will double all resources that you can plunder, including Forge Points and Guild Power.

first_strike.name: First Strike
first_strike.gb_description: Gives you a chance that at the start of the next several fights, a unit from the enemy's defense army will be killed immediately. This only applies to the first wave of a battle.

double_collection.name: Double Collection
double_collection.gb_description: Gives you a chance to get double the resources in the the first buildings collected. Excludes military and great buildings. Refreshes with each collection of this building.

description.p1: Enter the different values. The result is updated automatically.
description.p2_html: Note: If the update is not done automatically, click on "$t(utils.btn_calculate)".
